[b][color=white]April Fools Cancelled[/color][/b]
Turns out Hack Forums won't have an April Fools event this year. Lower your guards people, no need to be cautious.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5588797&pid=54489135#pid54489135] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Omniscient Retiring[/color][/b]
Shortly after posting about cancelling April Fools, it's come to our attention that sometime Fall 2017, Omniscient will retire and transfer Hack Forums ownership over to [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=103669]Factor8™[/url], an ex-administrator of Hack Forums. This is a shock to all of us, wish the best for Omniscient![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.news/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hack Forums News is Going Live[/color][/b]
We'll keep it short but we have signed a 2-year agreement with Fox News and its affiliates to broadcast hacking and security news on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday nights. To learn more, visit our [url=https://hackforums.news/]website[/url].[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.news/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Memo.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Sorry for The Delay[/color][/b]
I keep publishing the edition a day or two late. We're making changes to stop this delay. We'll now publish the edition incomplete on Friday and continue to add in sections as they're complete up until Tuesday. Hope that sounds better, thanks!

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/ScienceNews/ryand8_SN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Weaboo Virus Continues to Grow[/b][/color]
As antibodies and antiviruses have been applied throughout the years, a specific form of weaboo has proven resistant to all attempts to eradicate it from the Earth, continuing to evolve. Commonly referred to as 'New Ebola' the effects of this virus include various forms of binging, weirdness and obsession with Japanese culture. The CDC has announced that typical signs include obscure Japanese names, nonsensical anime references and major obsession with something referred to as Senpai. If anyone should come across "Senpai", it is highly advised to avoid it at all cost or you too will suffer from Weaboo. 

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Time Travel Now Possible[/b][/color]
After years of tachyon study and attempts to discover new particles through use of the hadron collider under the Swiss-French border, time travel has finally had a breakthrough and found to be currently possible. Studies have shown that while it is impossible to move backwards in time, we are currently able to move forward through time. Scientists say that in order to perform this leap through time, one must simply do nothing. A great example can be expressed through the very reading of this paragraph which has approximately taken you about 10-20 seconds which can be attributed to the fact that you are still reading and have actually moved forward that same 10-20 seconds. While further studies are being done to increase this leap forward through time, we must first utilize other means of energy such as the fingers used to type this and waste another 5 seconds of your life thus increasing the initial 10-20 seconds to 15-25 seconds further proving that advancements in time travel are being made.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Sozin's Comet Soon to Reach Earth[/color][/b] 
Sozin's Comet, also known as the Great Comet is a celestial object that passed by the earth every one hundred years.  The year 1917 was the last report of the comet passing by the Earth. Every time that the comet year happens, it will enter the upper atmosphere just skimming the surface of the earth. Nothing that would harm us. The father of Prince Zuko and Princess Azula, Fire Lord Ozai said that the comet offered great powers.  Ozai called it, "the power of a hundred suns". A lot of people from the fire nation grow stronger as the comet approaches and a few notable names like Aang, the Avatar gain a tremendous amount of fire energy that could be problematic if used in the wrong way. But sadly the Avatar Aang was nowhere to be found and the Fire Nation attacked. [i][size=x-small][url=source]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Terrorist Attack in Antarctica[/color][/b] 
A recent and tragic terrorist attack has occurred in Antarctica. On March 30 a group of penguins had flocked towards the continent and taken over the oceans surrounding it. A group of scientists noticed glaring red eyes in the distance coming towards their igloos and were unsure of what these entities were. As time went by, the penguins soon came over and swarmed the scientists' igloos. One survivor of the attack made it safely to the other side of the continent where he was able to call for help. The Navy Seals arrived and it was a full on penguin and seal battle that lasted for two days, and thanks to the Navy Seals everything is okay. [i][size=x-small][url=source]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Creepy Fox Spotted Around the World[/color][/b] 
All across the globe, from the United States all the way to Ireland there have been reports of creepy, red foxes spotted outside of people's homes. Now you might be wondering, "what is so scary about these foxes?" Well an eye witness to these foxes had a little story to share. His name is Alex Wright from North Dakota. He states that on his way home from McDonald's he had spotted something following him. He had no idea what it was and he was pretty freaked out. Alex decided to go an alternate route home in order to get rid of whatever was following him. To his knowledge that had gotten rid of whatever was chasing him. It is pretty creepy when something is following you, so it is not strange at all that Alex did this. Alex had heard from people in his small town about reports of a weird fox that has been spotted not only in his area of North Dakota but around the world too. The sun was setting and Alex was almost home. As he got near the street to  his house he felt the strange presence following him from before. He turned around and noticed something following him. He thought nothing of it and continued walking. As Alex got to the driveway of his house, he still had that feeling that someone was watching and as he turned around he noticed a very cute furry fox girl who shouted out, "NOTICE ME SENPAI". [i][size=x-small][url=Source]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/TechNews/Gladly.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Google's Parent Company, Alphabet, Hacked[/color][/b]
On Tuesday, Alphabet released a public statement notifying its investors that they had been hacked. The breach allowed access to the companies financials and employee database. Some analyst believe the exploit can be used on other websites like Facebook, Twitter, and even Google. Alphabet has yet to reveal how the hack happened and if they have patched it.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.news/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Snapchat's New Filter: XXXTentacion Filter[/color][/b]
Now you're able to yell lyrics using this filter and it will turn it into XXXTentacion's style of music with distorted bass. Snap, Inc. has stated this will only be active for the next week so make sure to check it out before it is gone! Here's what the filter turn your snaps into: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wmjpp0_6kb0]sample[/url].[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.news/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/an_1.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]The Live-Action Death Note Movie Gets A Trailer[/color][/b] 
The live-action movie in the making by Netflix of the anime series Death Note has gotten a lot of hate from fans. Many people have said that the movie is "whitewashing" and that the presence of no Japanese people are going to ruin the anime.  It will be interesting to see if the creators over at Netflix will leave any of the plot out considering it is a movie rather an a TV series. Either way the movie looks not so great but only time will tell. [i][size=x-small][url=http://kotaku.com/1793521907]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]SAO Brings in More Than 2 Million Yen in Japan[/color][/b] 
Since the release of the movie Sword Art Online: Ordinal Scale on Feb 18, the movie continues to stay on the charts of the top 10 most purchased tickets. In Japan alone it was estimated around 1.4 million people went to go see this movie. Worldwide it was estimated almost as much as the japan screenings with sales of over 0.7 million people. The sales of the movie in Japan earned 2 billion yen which in U.S. dollars is equal to $17,957,360, while worldwide the movie earned 600 million yen which is $5,387,208. If you are lucky enough to go to the sixth and seventh week of the anime you will get the chance to get two original cardboard posters from the character designer of the anime. Depending on the week you go, will determine which poster you get. The 6th week viewers get a Kirito and Eiji poster while the 7th week viewers get Asuna and Yuna! [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/58d388483cd780434d63f650/SAO-Brings-in-More-Than-2-Million-Yen-in-Japan]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Dubbed or Subbed?[/color][/b] 
Popular debate in the anime community is whether or not you liked dubbed anime or subbed. Two very popular streaming services for anime fans is Crunchyroll and Funimation. Crunchyroll showcases animes usually in their raw Japanese form with subtitles, while Funimation has dubbed versions of your favorite anime. The reason this is being brought up is the fact that the anime creators put so much time and effort in what you do, that when you purchase these streaming services you are helping the animators and developers tremendously. Both services offer free services where you need to watch ads before watching the full series and then they also over premium services. No the HFNT is not a sellout! We are not forcing you to purchase these subscriptions. Just know that dubbed anime is not that great and anyone that says it is better than subbed needs to go to a doctor. Like seriously. if you do not watch subbed then why do you call yourself an anime fan. Go back to Cartoon Network you pleb. (There are some cool dubbed anime do not hate me thanks.) [i][size=x-small][url=http://lifehacker.com/anime-streaming-showdown-crunchyroll-vs-funimation-1793623701]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Why You Need Nico in Your Life[/color][/b] 
Ever wondered what to do in life? Ever wondered if there was a person or thing to motivate you and get things going? Well that one thing should be the marvelous, beautiful Nico Yazawa.
